description: Single storey side/rear infill extension (ground floor) with photovaltic roof panels; rear roof extension (involving conversion of roofspace to habitable use).
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings:- Existing - ground floor plan 14-2016/40SMR/101 June 2016; Existing - first floor plan 14-2016/40SMR/102 June 2016; Existing - second floor plan 14-2016/40SMR/103 June 2016; Existing - roof plan 14-2016/40SMR/104; Existing - rear elevation section as 14-2016/40SMR/105 June 2016; Existing - side elevation/section 14-2016/40SMR/106 June 2016; Existing street elevation 14-2016/40SMR/107 June 2016; Proposed - site plan 14-2016/40SMR/100; Proposed - ground floor plan 14-2016/40SMR/300 June 2016; Proposed - first floor plan 14-2016/40SMR/301 Rev.A June 2016; Proposed - second floor plan 14-2016/40SMR/302 Rev. A June 2016; Proposed - roof plan 14-2016/40SMR/303 Rev.B June 2016; Proposed - rear elevation section aa 14-2016/40SMR/304 Rev. A June 2016; Proposed - side elevation/section 14-2016/40SMR/306 Rev. B July 2017,

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | No part of the flat roof of the single storey extension of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A, 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).
